mcq.statement: Finding out the correct sentence:I don't know why did he leave early, I need not to know why he left early,I should know why was he leaving early, I don't know why he left early.

options.a: I don't know why did he leave early
options.b: I need not to know why he left early
options.c: I should know why was he leaving early
options.d: I don't know why he left early.
